properties.title: Africa
properties.description:
The Africa Region covers 37 sub-Saharan countries and a population of over 800 million through 11,400 service points. Extreme poverty severely restricts access to sexual and reproductive health services, and restricted access to sexual and reproductive health services exacerbates the impact of poverty.

  • 39,473,382 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 2,370,768 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 14,581,128 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 7,107,781 HIV-related services provided
  • 227,576,575 condoms distributed
  • 316,693 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in Africa, visit the Africa Region’s website: www.ippfar.org
